TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerTransaction extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class DesignerTransaction Implements IDisposable
public ref class DesignerTransaction abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供一种方法来对一系列的设计时操作进行分组，从而提高性能并使得大多数类型的更改都能撤消。

span.span: Provides a way to group a series of design-time actions to improve performance and enable most types of changes to be undone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务可以跟踪更高版本可撤消的操作。Transactions can track actions that can be undone later. 取消事务，这会自动尝试通过将每个已更改的属性设置为更改前的值反向每次更改会逆转事务期间所做的更改。Changes made during a transaction can be reversed by canceling a transaction, which automatically attempts to reverse each change by setting each changed property to its pre-change value. 事务还可以通过推迟到显示的更新事务完成后才能提高性能的一系列操作。Transactions can also improve performance during a series of operations by deferring updates to the display until the completion of the transaction. 事务时，将推迟某些组件，其处理，直到事务完成后通过侦听和事件。When a transaction is in progress, some components defer their processing until the transaction has completed by listening to the and events. 属性窗口中，例如，不会更新其显示后前该事务已关闭已打开事务。The Properties window, for example, does not update its display after a transaction has opened until the transaction has closed. 若要使用可逆或多个操作的事务，可让设计器创建为每个操作或系列应是可逆的操作。To use transactions for reversible or multiple operations, have your designer create a for each operation or series of operations which should be reversible. 注意不要执行可能会导致无法成功完成一系列撤消事件在事务外的操作。Be careful not to perform actions outside the transactions that might prevent a sequence of undo events from completing successfully. 你可以获取一个新通过调用方法的。You can obtain a new by calling the method of an . 请务必获取每个活动从为了正确处理机制，而不是创建一个新的设计器事务与集成直接。Be sure to obtain each from the active in order to correctly integrate with the designer transaction processing mechanism, rather than creating a new directly. 若要执行的事务中的操作，必须先创建一个事务。To perform an action within a transaction, you must first create a transaction. 然后必须调用方法之前发生每个更改或变更集，并方法在每个更改或组的更改后发生。Then you must call the method before each change or set of changes occurs, and the method after each change or set of changes occur. 最后，完成并通过调用关闭事务方法。Finally, complete and close the transaction by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 更改属性值时，使用方法，它调用组件更改方法的，并创建自动表示更改。When making changes to property values, use the method of a , which calls the component change methods of the and creates a representing the change automatically. 若要执行事务，请完成以下步骤：To perform a transaction, complete the following steps: 1. 调用若要获取可用于控制事务。Call to obtain a that can be used to control the transaction. 2. 内`try`块中，为你想要跟踪的每个操作，调用方法，请更改或更改，然后调用方法以指示是否已进行的更改。Within a `try` block, for each action that you want to track with a , call the method, make the change or changes, then call the method to signal that the change or changes have been made. 3. 若要完成事务，调用从`finally`块。To complete the transaction, call from within a `finally` block. 在 C# 中，你可以使用`using`语句而非`try/finally`块，如如以下示例所示。In C#, you can use the `using` statement rather than a `try/finally` block, such as in the following example. ``` using (host.CreateTransaction() { // Insert your code here. } ``` 若要取消并尝试回滚事务，已提交之前，请调用方法。To cancel and attempt to roll back a transaction before it has been committed, call the method. 当调用方法时，操作跟踪的反转，以尝试回滚所做的更改。When the method is invoked, the actions tracked by the are reversed to attempt to roll back the changes. 若要撤消的较早的事务的过程中发生的操作，必须使用开发环境提供的撤消命令。To undo actions that occurred as part of earlier transactions, you must use the undo command provided by the development environment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例程序演示如何创建从设计器。The following code example program demonstrates how to create a from a designer. 若要运行此示例，请将源代码编译到类库。To run this sample, compile the source code into a class library. 必须添加对 System.Design 程序集的引用。You must add a reference to the System.Design assembly. 在新项目中，添加对已编译的 DLL 的引用，并将组件添加到库中**工具箱**。In a new project, add a reference to the compiled DLL and add the component in the library to the **Toolbox**. 没有对此功能在 Visual Studio 中的广泛支持。There is extensive support for this feature in Visual Studio. 另请参阅[演练：自动填充工具箱与自定义组件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx)。Also see [Walkthrough: Automatically Populating the Toolbox with Custom Components](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx). 在设计器可以选择显示有关设计器事务事件通知。The designer can optionally display notifications about designer transaction events. 如果添加的实例`DTComponent`到窗体在设计模式下一个消息框出现，询问是否想要接收事件通知设计器事务。If you add an instance of the `DTComponent` to a form while in design mode, a message box appears asking whether you would like to receive designer transaction event notifications. 您可能会切换使用的快捷菜单中右键单击的实例时，将显示这些通知`DTComponent`。You may toggle these notifications using the shortcut menu that appears when you right-click an instance of the `DTComponent`. 使用属性窗口更改值时创建的事务。Transactions are created when you change values using the Properties window. 您还可以通过单击来执行事务的设计器**执行示例事务**组件的快捷菜单上。You can also have the designer perform a transaction by clicking **Perform Example Transaction** on the shortcut menu for the component. [!code-cpp[DesignerTransaction Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerTransaction Sample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DesignerTransaction Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerTransaction Sample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerTransaction Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerTransaction Sample/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: if the transaction was canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消设计器事务时，事务处理机制将尝试回滚在事务中的到目前为止进行的更改。When a designer transaction is canceled, the transaction processing mechanism attempts to roll back the changes that have been made so far in the transaction. 其他操作妨碍了任何相关的代码的状态，以及是否有一系列的预期操作未能完成，则它成功与否取决于每个操作的类型等因素。Whether this succeeds is dependent upon such factors as the type of each operation, whether other operations interfered with any of the involved code's state, and whether a sequence of expected operations failed to complete.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

span.span: Commits this transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提交设计器事务时，该事务视为完成并不跟踪进一步的更改。When a designer transaction is committed, the transaction is considered complete and does not track further changes. 一旦事务已提交，进一步调用此方法不执行任何操作。Once a transaction has been committed, further calls to this method do nothing. 始终创建事务以确保事务正常关闭后调用此方法。Always call this method after creating a transaction to ensure that the transaction closes properly.

Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源； 表示仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.span: for full access to system resources.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
Implementing a Dispose Method
Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 释放与此对象关联的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources associated with this object.

summary.span: 如果此事务尚未被提交，则此重写方法将提交此事务。

span.span: This override commits this transaction if it was not already committed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写并通过调用清除资源`Dispose(false)`。This method overrides and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`. 重写 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自定义清理。Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup. 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法将自动调用垃圾回收期间除非终止由垃圾回收器已禁用通过调用方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))，[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消设计器事务时，事务处理机制将尝试回滚在事务中的到目前为止进行的更改。When a designer transaction is canceled, the transaction processing mechanism attempts to roll back the changes that have been made so far in the transaction. 其他操作妨碍了任何相关的代码的状态，以及是否有一系列的预期操作未能完成，则它成功与否取决于每个操作的类型等因素。Whether this succeeds is dependent upon such factors as the type of each operation, whether other operations interfered with any of the involved code's state, and whether a sequence of expected operations failed to complete.
